mutants.code:
def derive(coefficient, exponent):
    product = coefficient / exponent
    new_exponent = exponent - 1
    return f'{product}x^{new_exponent}'

def derive(coefficient, exponent):
    product = coefficient + exponent
    new_exponent = exponent - 1
    return f'{product}x^{new_exponent}'

def derive(coefficient, exponent):
    product = coefficient ** exponent
    new_exponent = exponent - 1
    return f'{product}x^{new_exponent}'

def derive(coefficient, exponent):
    product = coefficient * exponent
    new_exponent = exponent + 1
    return f'{product}x^{new_exponent}'

def derive(coefficient, exponent):
    product = coefficient * exponent
    new_exponent = exponent * 1
    return f'{product}x^{new_exponent}'

def derive(coefficient, exponent):
    product = coefficient * exponent
    new_exponent = exponent - 2
    return f'{product}x^{new_exponent}'

def derive(coefficient, exponent):
    product = coefficient * exponent
    new_exponent = exponent - 0
    return f'{product}x^{new_exponent}'

def derive(coefficient, exponent):
    product = coefficient * exponent
    new_exponent = exponent - 0
    return f'{product}x^{new_exponent}'

def derive(coefficient, exponent):
    product = coefficient * exponent
    new_exponent = exponent - -1
    return f'{product}x^{new_exponent}'

def derive(coefficient, exponent):
    product = coefficient * exponent
    new_exponent = exponent - 1
    return f'{product}{new_exponent}'
